Perfil.profile-funcion: FullStack Developer, FullStack Developer, Python (Django | Flask), Python (Django | Flask)

Secciones.about-me-contenido: I’m a Full Stack Developer focused on modern web design, combining technical skills with a solid foundation in communication. With over 15 years of experience in advertising, copywriting, and digital marketing, I bring a strategic and integrated perspective to every project. I believe in the web as a powerful tool for communication and business growth. I’m motivated to take on challenging projects where I can grow and contribute value from both the technical and creative sides.
